channel.title: [PI]How Do I Make Player Owned Shops?[PI]

item.title: [PI]How Do I Make Player Owned Shops?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @CorruptionX-Pk CorruptionX-Pk™
item.description:
@CorruptionX-Pk wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:6, topic:403867”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=500928.msg3664485#msg3664485 date=1310530542]
What I would do is make the data export into a SQL database ready to use. And then maybe make a boolean to make sure they have set up a shop. Then add some commands to access the SQL database and see what they have to offer.
[/quote]

It’s a bit more complicated then that, and I’m sure someone asking to be spoonfed on how to make player owned shops wouldn’t know how to set up a SQL database.[/quote]
-____-
yes i do

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How Do I Make Player Owned Shops?[PI]

item.title: [PI]How Do I Make Player Owned Shops?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

The Wanderer:

What I would do is make the data export into a SQL database ready to use. And then maybe make a boolean to make sure they have set up a shop. Then add some commands to access the SQL database and see what they have to offer.

It’s a bit more complicated then that, and I’m sure someone asking to be spoonfed on how to make player owned shops wouldn’t know how to set up a SQL database.

item.description:
@CorruptionX-Pk wrote:

imsuperman05:

I tried to rip it from another server before and didn’t work out cause it was lame, but add it in playersave.java, commands.java which opens shop, and shopassistant.java( a new method for the playershop), and prob more files.

well i need the codes
